headline: TotalEnergies Boosts Presence in Germany With $1.65 Billion VSB Deal
summary: TotalEnergies struck a deal to buy renewable-energy company VSB Group from Partners Group for $1.7 billion, expanding its presence in Germany.

raw.headline: TotalEnergies Boosts Presence in Germany With $1.65 Billion VSB Deal

headline: Apollo Funds Acquire 50% Stake in 2 GW Texas Solar and BESS Portfolio from TotalEnergies
summary: NEW YORK, Dec. 04, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Apollo (NYSE: APO) today announced that funds managed by Apollo affiliates (the “Apollo Funds”) have agreed to acquire a 50% stake in a Texas solar and battery energy storage system (“BESS”) portfolio from TotalEnergies. The portfolio includes approximately 2 GW of solar and BESS assets in strategic locations in Texas’ ERCOT market, consisting of three solar projects with a total capacity of 1.7 GW and two battery storage projects with a combined capac

headline: Notified Expands GlobeNewswire’s Canadian Presence with Le Devoir Partnership
summary: Exclusive Alliance Marks First Time a Quebec Publication Has Partnered with Newswire Service for Press Release SyndicationNEW YORK, Dec. 04, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Notified, a globally trusted technology partner for public relations and investor relations professionals, is proud to give communicators better reach and value in their Canadian news distribution through an exclusive partnership with Le Devoir, one of Canada's most esteemed daily newspapers.
